message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a valuable asset that will be worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,100,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  How about we split the difference and settle on $1,150,000? This way, we both get a good deal.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,080,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
